2024-08-01.name: Kimi ni Todoke 3rd Season
2024-08-01.desc:
* Based on a shoujo school romantic manga by Shiina Karuho.

As a new couple, Sawako and Kazehaya experience their first date, first school trip and more. Meanwhile, their friends' love stories also begin to unfold.

Source: Netflix

2024-08-02.name: Boku no Hero Academia the Movie: You`re Next

2024-08-03.name: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka wa Wakaranai (2024)

2024-08-06.name: Long Zhong Ren
2024-08-06.desc:
Fei Xingkong and Si Rui suddenly found themselves living in a cage of comics. They wanted to escape back to the real world. However, facing the absolute control of the "author", they were forced to flee in the ever-changing story world...

source: Bilibili/googletranslate

2024-08-06.name: Rising Impact (2024)
2024-08-06.desc:
Nanaumi Gawain is a third-grader with an incredible love for baseball and making the ball really fly. In a chance encounter with a female professional golfer, Nishino Kiria, he learns that golf will allow him to hit a ball further than any other sport.

Using his physical strength and keen observational skills gained from living in a rural mountain area, he manages to hit the ball to such an impressive distance that it rivals even that of professionals. With Kiria's help, the new golf enthusiast enrolls at Camelot Academy, a prestigious school for both skilled and aspiring golfers from around the world. Gawain wants to be the best professional golfer in the world but there are other golf prodigies with extraordinary skills that stand in his way and he has to face various trials to overcome them.

Source: Netflix

2024-08-07.name: Feng Ling Yu Xiu Di Er Ji: Tebie Pian
2024-08-07.desc:
The road ahead is long and stormy, but true friends will stand shoulder to shoulder and go to the end of the world together!

source: movie.douban.com

2024-08-07.name: Yeosin Gangnim
2024-08-07.desc:
Once bullied for her looks, Jugyeong transforms herself using the art of makeup. When she joins a new school with a True Beauty goddess competition, offering winners the chance of recruitment by entertainment agencies, she instantly becomes a top candidate! But her new identity is at stake when heartthrob Suho Lee accidentally sees her bare face. Will her elite status be short-lived?

Source: Crunchyroll

2024-08-08.name: Delico`s Nursery
2024-08-08.desc: Note: The first two episodes received an early screening at a special event on July 12, 2024 at United Cinemas Aqua City Odaiba in Tokyo. The regular TV broadcast started on August 8, 2024.

2024-08-09.name: Eiga Crayon Shin-chan: Ora-tachi no Kyouryuu Nikki

2024-08-16.name: Rick and Morty: The Anime
2024-08-16.desc: Note: The first episode received an early screening on June 30, 2024 at DoKomi in Dusseldorf, Germany.

2024-08-30.name: Kimi no Iro
2024-08-30.desc:
Totsuko is a high-school student who attends a Christian Academy in Nagasaki and can see the hearts of people as colors. Whether they're happy colors, sad colors, peaceful colors, frightened colors... In order to not darken her friend's and family's "colors," Totsuko is careful to read the room and stretches the truth to keep them all brightly colored. Totsuko then meets a beautiful girl who radiates very striking colors and a boy who loves music in a used bookstore in the corner of town. The three come together and form a band to make the music of their adolescence.

Source: Crunchyroll News

2024-08-30.name: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu (2024)
2024-08-30.desc:
A year has passed since Subaru's victory at the Sanctuary. He savors a life of fulfillment while Emilia's camp stands united for the royal selection—until a fateful letter arrives. Anastasia, a royal selection candidate, has invited Emilia to the Watergate City of Priestella. But as the party begins its journey, crisis stirs beneath the surface and Subaru meets a cruel fate once again.

Source: Crunchyroll

Note: The first episode premiered at Anime Expo LA on July 5, the Japan Expo Paris screening on July 11 got cancelled. It also received a limited two-week advance theater screening run throughout Japan, on August 30. The regular TV broadcast started in October.
